name: Under The Pyramid
description:
The Game

The player is an archaeologist who gets locked in the depths of a pyramid with his companions. Each archaeologist must find the clues and steal from their companions to escape.

In this demo, you must find the 3 vases in order to escape before the creatures catch you or the place falls into pieces.  Watch out for the blackouts! You don't know what may crawl in the dark.
